name: Hide'N'Treat
description:
You play as a kid disguised as a pig.

Your goal is to get as many candies as you can but be careful  as the other kids are a bit agressive and will not refrain from hurting you to steal them.

Developers  : Nicolas Corrieri / Yoann Eveillard

Artists : Antton Videgain / Yann Duverneuil / Remi Lahaine
